laboratory_examinations.findings: Iron saturation was 3 percent (normal range, 15 to 40 percent).
Creatinine level was 2.0 mg per deciliter (177 µmol per liter).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine level increased from 1.4 mg per deciliter (7 days before admission) to 2.1 mg per deciliter (on admission) and then to 2.0 mg per deciliter.

laboratory_examinations.date: 7 days before admission, On admission, Third hospital day, Fifth hospital day, Sixth hospital day
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: White cell count fluctuated; increased from 22,900 to a peak of 22,100 per mm³, then decreased to 9,700 per mm³.
No change in urea nitrogen levels; remained stable at 29 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.date: On admission, Third hospital day, Sixth hospital day

findings.description: Dense consolidation in the right upper lobe, blunted costophrenic angles.
Partial clearing of the consolidation in the right upper lobe.
Persistent right-upper-lobe consolidation and worsening diffuse interstitial opacities.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The consolidation in the right upper lobe showed initial improvement followed by worsening on the sixth hospital day.
